hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
rm -rf data/* rm -rf completed/* # Managed Inputs aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} data/
mkdir data mkdir completed mkdir hierarchies mkdir processing
IFS=',' [ ! -f data/Managed_Inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type stdy_full_name data_type is_harm subj_id_col data_ready data_processed do echo "$abv_name $data_ready $data_processed"
if [[ ${data_ready,,} == *"yes"* ]]; then if [[ ${data_processed,,} == *"no"* ]]; then
echo "Decoding $abv_name $stdy_id $stdy_type $stdy_full_name"
find data/ -type f -name "phs*" -exec rm -rf {} \;
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/resources/job.config resources/ --quiet
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/rawData/ data/ --recursive --quiet
java -jar jars/DbgapDecodeFiles.jar
aws s3 rm s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/decoded_data/ --recursive
aws s3 cp completed/ s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${abv_name,,}/decoded_data/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "phs*txt" --quiet
find completed/ -type f -name "phs*" -exec rm -rf {} \; else echo "$abv_name already processed" fi else echo "$abv_name not ready for processing" fi
done < data/Managed_Inputs.csv
